what plugin(s) did the manifest editor correspond to?
I was editing a plugin.xml file which I disabled by renaming to plugin.xml.off.

I suspect the steps were something like:
- open PME on Test project's plugin.xml
- activate some other editor
- exit/restart
- PME editor was not the active editor, so it was not fully materialized
- rename Test project's plugin.xml to plugin.xml.off
- active PME editor
- it is materialized, creating its controls (this is what the stack shows)
- it goes to the model for the plugin in question but doesn't find it


Just tried renaming plugin.xml.off to plugin.xml and got:

>rename Test project's plugin.xml to plugin.xml.off
The inactive editor just closed gracefully.
I just tried it, and got the same as you.  I had also opened a plugin.xml
